fr.umlv.escape.world

Class CollisionMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.umlv.escape.world.CollisionMonitor

  • public class CollisionMonitor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manage what should happen when body collisions. It is a contact listener of the EscapeWorld

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void beginContact(Contact arg0) 
      void endContact(Contact arg0) 
      void performPostStepCollision()
      As no operations can be done on bodies while there are colliding some operations are postponed and are done in this method which have to be called just after a step.
      void postSolve(Contact arg0, ContactImpulse arg1) 
      void preSolve(Contact arg0, Manifold arg1)

    • Method Detail

      • performPostStepCollision

        public void performPostStepCollision()
        As no operations can be done on bodies while there are colliding some operations are postponed and are done in this method which have to be called just after a step.
